A novel URL Shortcut Tool

Welcome!! This is REWQ - a very simple idea. It is a shortcut url for any longer, frequently visited url.

R_E_W_Q are top 4 letters on your keyboard and you can kind of swipe to enter them.

Whenever, you swipe on your keyboard these 4 letters 'r-e-w-q-TAB'/NAME - we will redirect you to the link from below.

Setup your shortcuts here

Always save after editing.

Tips

You need to save if you change any value above.

Take a backup in by copying into Notes. Title it `#rewq links`.
